external_games.name: Play Together - Starter Pack - Bear Girl

name: Play Together: Starter Pack - Bear Girl
summary: "We're not bratty, we just like to have a little fun!!" Get the adorable Bratty Sister Bear costume, a vehicle, in-game currencies, and tools in one bundle at a low price! Enjoy life in Play Together with this Starter Pack that's jam-packed with must-have items!
